else curious tast might distast need second bush ti wast yet well thy choice minerua merit iviegarland euerlasting greene like grace cup proportiond whereout thou drinkst wherein liquours beene wouldst thou scape lash nemesis diogenes thou shouldst refuse let thirstie drinke therehence twere newes thy book arke world containes well may beare short encomion ti slender meede yet pay disdaines antoeci dwell vnder meridian latitude parallel equally distant aequator one northward southward dayes place length one summer others winter perioeci dwell parallel side aequator distant soeuer east tryed blade called bilbo blade towne great trafficke consequently great rich • ng many priuate men yeerely build three foure shippes countrie mountainous woodie whose hils arise 150 riuers iberus duerus chiefe excellent timber build shippes abundance iron called armorie spaine people prouince vse language different rest spaine reported haue continued without great alteration since confusion babel brerewood age stand proue though argument hereof may small affinity hath tongue yet ancient language spaine probable people haue euer continued without mixture forreine nation neuer throughly subdued either romanes carthaginian gothes moore remained liberty mastered language altered like manner arabique continueth vncorrupt hillie part granada tongue old brittaines wale ancient epirotique high woodie part countrie neither doe biscaines differ rest spaine language customes also three set light rest first account themselues free tax contribution king spaine yeelding obedience body purse spanish king progress come frontier countrie hee bareth one leg manner entreth met lord gentleman dwelling proffe • small brasse piece marauidis call whereof 600 goe crown leatherne bag hanging end lance tell hee must take ceremony performed attend king journey learned gentleman hath spent time countriea good place puritan • dweilin 2ly admit bishop come amongst fernand catholique came progresse hither accompanied amongst others bishop pampelune people arose armes draue back bishop gathering dust thought troden slung sea 3ly woman meeting doe first drinke custome hath continued euer since ogn • countesse castilc would haue poysoned sonne sancho ancient inhabitant cantabri people courage defended liberty country roman residue spaine subdued last without great effusion blood manifest token manly resolution heroick spirit part vanquished darling fortune augustus hillie mountainous people alwayes last conquered first stand guard besides biscanies navarroys asturians spaine respect moore 1 triumpher entreth royall chariot met senatours ornament ovator entreth foot met knight gentleman rome 2• triumpher lawrell crowne entered noyse drummes trumpet ovator garland firre flute hoboyes thus much citty chiefe province 1 marca trevigiana bounded south riuer po hist ven west dutchie millaine east friuli gulfe venice north tirolis chiefe citty treuiso whence countrey named hath beene lewis 11th • ry castile meeting purposely ao 1463 took dislike others person behauiour neuer loued one another like example bringeth interviewes frederick emperour charles duke burgundie edward fourth stature passing well skilled archerie maginus 2 bodia hath north scricfinnia south finland east sinns finnicus part muscouie west large capacious bay seagulet hence called sinus bodicns chief townes 1 virtis 2 vista 3 helsinga honoured title dukedome 3 finland hath north bodia south balticke sea mare suevicum east sinus finnicus west sinus bodicus munster thought called finland quasi fine land quod pulchrior amoenior sit suecia fine pleasing country sweden selfe indeed called finni fenni potent nation haue dwelt whose character thus framed tacitus finnis • ra feritas faeda paupertas non arma non equi non penates victuiherbae vestitui pelles cubile humus sola sagi • ti spes c agreeth euery way present finlander especially scricfinnia finmarchia well reclaimed ciuility finland populous 1450 lodovicus present henry walpat 18th master yet lodovicus easily vanquished hauiug formerly driuen king field routed whole army slaine 3000 men taken 136 nobility neither ouercome rebellion people ncan king scotland two principall men employed matter importance machbed banquho two travelling together forrest mette three fairy witch weird scot call whereof first making obeisance vnto machbed come race king euer rule scotland thus said suddenly vanished vpon arriuall court machbed immediatly created thane glammis long new seruice requiring new recompence honoured title thane cawder seeing happily prediction three weird fell two former hee resolued bee wanting himselfe fulfilling third therefore first hee killed king reason command among souldiers common people succeeded throne scarce town printing whether iohn gertrudenberg learned chinoys whether good invention like good wit sometimes jumpe dare determine sure hee first taught europe say yeare 1440 harlem said first practised mentz perfected whereas doubted whether art printing auaileable proficiencie aduancement learning must herein iudge party must leaue decision hereof interessed cause dare boldly say exquisite roman taught shipping caesar himselfe affirming ad eos mercatores minimè cōmeant sea twixt brittaine france ill furnished vessel caesar souldiers compelled make shippes transportation army singulari said invented open vessel aegyptians shippes deckes also invented galley two bankes side vessel length time grew large ptolomie philopater made one fewer 50 bankes oares one side large ship burden hispania whence king spaine vse stile themselues hispaniarum reges country excellent tree called mete plant dresse doe vine hath 40 kindes leaues serue many v tender make conserues paper flaxe mantle mat shooes girdle cordage leaues grow certain prickle strong sharpe vse insteed sawes root tree commeth iuyce like vnto sirrop seethe become hony purifie become sugar may also make wine vineger rinde rosted healeth hurt sore topboughes issueth gumme excellent antidote poi • aboundeth goldensanded riuers many crocodile though bigge crocodile egypt people eate much furnished goldemines glorieth mountaine pr • pochampathe nature aetna vesuvius limit east incutan gulfe mexico west calformio mar vermiglio south peruana northerne bound vnknowne cannot certainely avow america continent certainely affirme iland distinguished old world populous arriuall spaniard 17 yeares slew 6 million rosting plucking eye cutting armes others casting liuing bee deuoured wild beast diuided four part viz noua woman apparell horse • street also printing house vniuersity mint nigh citty gulfe mexico whose current swift heady shipps cannot passe directly fro compelld beare either much north much south 900 mile compasse hath two port one betweene farthest part iucutan ile cuba tide violent streame entreth said cuba farthest point florida tide like violence goeth forth sea tempestuous hath two safe porte viz havana north side 2 st iohn de lua strongly fortified spaniard south people mexico tremistitan witty industrious full courage valour good handicraftsmen giue mindes rich marchants apply themselues warres vsed sling arrowes since comming spaniard among harcubuise king succeeded right bloud election commonly actiue lusty fit war people holding lawfull kill king reputed coward among order knight instituted last king licensed weare gold siluer cloathed cotton weare breech prohibited vulgar country inferiour peru plenty puritie gold siluer farre exceeding mechanical ingenious art professed abundance fruit cattle last store many priuate man hath 40000 kine ox himselfe fish also great plenty drawne lake whereon mexico standeth reputed worth 20000 crownes mexican first inhabitant nova gallicia whence made violent irruption coniectured anno 720 lingred diuers place till yeare 902 vnder leading mexi captaine built citty called name generall 7 tribe ruled long aristocraticall state refused saying conuenient commonwealth another king hee execute necessity state thē lay whole burden vpon backe without king would leaue labour publike well vpon generous refusall made choice pearles men country doe naturally loue warre reuenge insomuch continually warre one crafty also intelligent appeareth answere gaue ferdinando soto spaniard among ao 1549 went perswade people hee sonne god came teach law replied floridan god neuer bad thee kill slaie thus worke kinde mischief amongst v woman husband dead vse cut haire close eares strew sepulchre cannot marry againe till haire grown continual residence hath • aire market place midst two high way thwart one another 2000 mile long straight leuell runne crosse country 5 gaiachu 6 portoueio digging graues sexton happen many time teeth men 3 finger broad 7 tomobamba glory • ng faire pall • ce 8 caxamalca chiefe riuers 1 maragnon 2 guaiachil 3 rio di la plate 150 mile broad mouth 2000 long thereabouts country beast hath hir neck bagge indifferent greatnesse putteth yonglings approach body scuddeth away also said figtree north part looketh towards mountaines bringeth forth fruit summer south part looketh toward sea fruitfull onely winter peruvian haue thus much notice generall deluge country ouerwhelmed water men perished except seauen hid themselues hole cell paticambo hauing liued safety till fury water asswaged came lu • kingplace repeopled country chiefe seauen mangocapa whose posterity possessing country plot ground 20 mile circuit gouerned themselues aristocraticall state last chose king mutation commonwealth computation coniectured anno 1280 somewhat nigh king peru 1 ingarcia 2 vanguazagnaque 3 vixococa 4 pacachuti 5 guaimacapa 8 guascar 8 atabaliba 7 mangocapa 8 amare luckie prince 8 guaimacapa extended empire largenesse hath since death fortune hath frowned two sonnes guascar atabalipa immediatly solemnizing funerall striued empire till francisco pizarro spanish captaine ended controuersie seasing kingdome vse master spaine guascar slaine atabalipa seeing whole kingdome lay stake laid rich life liberty cast dice plaine nigh city caximalos dice running sp • niards side gaue glory day haplesse atabalipa remained prisoner infinite slaughter subiects gaue vnto spaniard ransome life liberty house piled vp side refined gold siluer estimation 10 million receiued perfidiously slew two successours laboured restoring ruinated inheritance preuailed nothing wickednesse peruvian full god sent spaniard amongst executioner vengeance anno 1533 pizarro subdued potent flourishing kingdome made member spanish empire borne trusiglio village navarre poore whore mother laide church porch left god prouidence whose direction none found would giue brest nourished certaine dayes sucking sow last one gonsalles soldier acknowledged sonne put nurse somewhat growne set keepe swine strayed boy durst feare returne home betooke himselfe heeles ran vnto sevill shipped himselfe america prospered king spaine honoured good seruice title marquesse anatillo anno 1535 strange fortune man call minde like sinan great bassa court selimus first borne base parentage child sleeping shade genitals bitten sow turkish officer vsually prouided yong boyes seruice grand signeur epyrus sinans country hearing extraordinary eunuch tooke among others along court vnder mahomet great baiaz • second sonne selimus exceedingly thriued hee made chiefe bassa court well deserued accounted selimus right hand indeed man whose valour especially turkes owe kingdome aegypt perhaps impertinent brasile hath north guiana south rio de la plate chile east ocean west mountaines peru called andes diuide country peruana taurus imaus doe asia mount atlas africke hill high craggie barren full rauenous beast poisonous serpent say destroyed whole army one peruvian king passage way also liue mountaine people farre barbarous rest american hairie ouer body going altogether naked liuing without house bedding descend valleyes country aire healthfull temper earth fat alwaies flourishing great store sugar wonderfull rich mine sinewes region hence commeth red wood vse dying cloathes called captain man note atchieued enterprise magellanus perishing midst therefore reported haue giuen deuice globe motto tu primus circumdedisti navigation begun anno 1577 two yeares halfe great vicissitude straight continueth openeth sea 8 mile long many broad beyond lyeth second straight right west southwest first perillous vnpleasing passage 3 league long mile bredth straight openeth selfe another sea 4 10 note southerne latitude end america vnknowne part world thus much knowne part world vnknowne part world rather haue litle certaine relation either northerne sovtherne —atqui quò properas mea cymbae redi satis ardua ponti navimus ecce auster pluvias iam cogere nubes incipit hic tutum non est mihi crede morari dum licet portum tondamus nubila clarum reddiderint ubi pulsadiem revocabit ab alto no triton scopulo que iterum tentabimus aequor whither goeth barke returne wee haue slicd capring b • ine inough see see south wind ginne gather cloud apace ti safe tarrying fierce place whilst thou hast time retire wearied barke safe harbour cloud darke world bright eye shall dispelld away phoebus shining make lightsome day triton shrill trump shall recall againe thee thy harbour foaming
